alert.note: Alert for Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 8:10PM CDT until May 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Lisbon affecting Ransom County. .Additional rises back into flood stage are expected on the Sheyenne River at Lisbon. This forecast only takes into account forecasted rainfall through Sunday 7PM. Additional rises are possible in areas that receive the heaviest rain. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY, MAY 15... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River at Lisbon. * WHEN...Until Sunday, May 15. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. Raw sewage begins being dumped into the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Tuesday evening to a crest of 15.2 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
